The thing about the Oideyo! Mizuryu Kei Land series is that there's no rape, its a place were people go to have sex with anyone, but everything must be consented between the people doing it, if you want to go there and just watch, never touching anyone or be touched, you can do it(although I doubt you will), if you want to go there to have sex with only your partner, no problem. But of course, there's the cheating and cuck thing in some stories, but at least its just more like a swinging party than a ntr with fucked plot, also, there's no ugly fat old dudes, so, less pain to go through. Takeda hiromitsu should do something more like this one here, since he's not doing vanilla anymore, at least this is better than the typical "bad route ntr" stuff, I mean, I do read those stuff too, but more for the art, since the plot kinda push me away...
